text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews 122,000 dead Americans, 40 million unemployed and you are still obsessing over ratings. how many of those watching just wanted a good laugh? I hear there's a drinking game, trump lies take a shot. How about that idiotic logic, if you don't test, you don't have Covid19 cases?
